title: Tech News: Amoral Algorithms and Anticompetitive App Stores
itunes:title: Tech News: Amoral Algorithms and Anticompetitive App Stores
description:
Former president Donald Trump files legal complaints against YouTube, Twitter and Facebook. More than 30 states say that the Google App store is "monopolistic." China's WeChat shuts down LGBT channels on the platform. And Dodge announces an all-electric muscle car.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
